UPDATE PARKING SET
DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parkingNo}
UPDATE PARKING SET DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE PARKING_NO = #{parkingNo}

MODIFY_DATE = TO_DATE(#{enrollDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'),
